00094 #ifndef COREDATA_PRECONDITION
00095 #define COREDATA_PRECONDITION(cond,message) {\
00096         if (!(cond))\
00097         {\
00098             std::stringstream s;\
00099             s << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__ << ": " << message;\
00100             throw std::invalid_argument(s.str());\
00101         }\
00102     }
00103 #endif

00138 // typedefs to add more meaning to std::vector of float types
00139 // These indicate how many elements are expected.
00140 // Also, this gives us the option to use swig typemaps to map these to 
00141 // better language types.
00142 namespace sm
00143 {
00144     namespace eod
00145     {
00147 
00150         typedef std::vector<int32> iStdVector2;
00152 
00155         typedef std::vector<float> fStdVector2;
00157 
00160         typedef std::vector<float> fStdVector3;
00162 
00165         typedef std::vector<double> dStdVector2;
00167 
00170         typedef std::vector<double> dStdVector3;
00172 
00175         typedef std::vector<double> dStdVector4;
00176     }
00177 }
